casebody.data:
In re M.A.L. appealed by Roger L. and Samantha L., Respondents. No. 74P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. Peter Wood, for Roger L. Jennifer O'Connor, Raleigh, for Johnston County DSS. Richard Croutharmel, for Samantha L.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st day of February 2005 by Respondent (Roger L.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of March 2005."
